summary: Leliana is a follower, she is also a bard so she can play songs for you!
descriptionHtml:
Hey! This is my first Mod, I allways liked Liliana in Dragon Age so i tried to build her in Skyrim. Dont expect to much. :) 

Special thanks to Apachii for his/her great Hairstyle mod! Its needed so go and get it here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 


She can be found in Breezehome and she cant die in Combat. She wont wear clothes so you can give her whatever you like.

She Levels with the player and is focused on 1H Combat and Archery. 

Also she can be married and can play Bard songs while in Breezehome in Whiterun! For her to be able to play in Breezehome I had to change the probertys of the Home to Inn(might not work with other mods who changed breezehome). Every Bard flagged follower should be able to play there. 

No DLC needed.

Recommed mods:
amazing smooth Female faces
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/140

Apachii NPC overhaul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15411 

Probably to do list: 
- Unique custom Song (Will be tough because Im a noob but I hope to find way) 

Known Bugs/Errors 
- If you updated the File from Steamcloud and allready had her as Follower then after Marriage she might say that you allready have a follower even though you dont. This console Line should solve the problem: 
\"set playerfollowercount to 0\" without the quotes 

- If you have an issue that the Marriage dialogue dont appear, try using the console line above, I couldnt rebuild that error for testing but i hope it works, let me know if any other problems appear

PS: I hope did everything right with publishing, pls contact me if i have to change something :)
author: ironduck666

files.name: Akaviri Kojima Extended V5_0 ESP only
